page.title: 19SHOPPING IN THRESHFIELD
page.content: Although the population of{Threshfield has grown over the years from being a community solely made up of the native farming community to one containing people from a wide variety of backgrounds, with a resultant wide variety of shopping needs, the facilities for fulfilling these needs locally has not grown with the population increase. To date{(25.7.85.)}there is only one local general store and while this seeks to provide as wide a range of merchandise as possible it is usually limited to consumables.Even this is undertaken with some difficulty because of competition from large {Supermarkets}in the urban areas.The local shop cannot compete with the prices offered by these Supermarkets and so frequently changes hands because of the lack of profit.
